remarks: Version of ~ rabeqbidv with two dv conditions removed and the third replaced by a non-freeness hypothesis.  (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2019.)
statement:
bj-rabeqbid.nf $e |- F/ x ph $.
bj-rabeqbid.1 $e |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
bj-rabeqbid.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
bj-rabeqbid $p |- ( ph -> { x e. A | ps } = { x e. B | ch } ) $.
